title: Heating water is a method of storing solar energy

content.prompt: Which of the following is the best example of an energy storage element in a solar energy system?

choices.label: The photovoltaic array in a solar electric system
The overhang that blocks sunlight in a passively cooled home
The insulated windows in a passively heated solar home
The sun-tracking mirrors in a power tower system
The hot water tank in a solar hot water system

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
